turnOnMicrophone.note: Aria label for the microphone button in muted state.

turnOffMicrophone.note: Aria label for the microphone button in unmuted state.

turnOnCamera.note: Aria label for the camera button in hidden state.

turnOffCamera.note: Aria label for the camera button in unhidden state.

deviceConnected.note: Aria label for the camera button in unhidden state.

deviceDisconnected.note: Aria label for the camera button in unhidden state.

openSettings.note: Aria label for the settings button.

leaveMeeting.note: Aria label for the leave meeting button.

startScreenSharing.note: Aria label for the screen sharing button in inactive state.

stopScreenSharing.note: Aria label for the screen sharing button in active state.

goLive.note: Aria label for the button that opens the 'go live' setup modal.

stopStream.note: Aria label for the button that stops a broadcast stream.
